sentences.en: English for Navigation , seaway, and enterprising management is officially starting.
sentences.cn: 航空英语 、 海乘英语 、 企业代培正式启动!

sentences.en: Q : Where is the St. Lawrence Seaway?
The Saint Lawrence Seaway opened in nineteen fifty - nine.
sentences.cn: 圣.劳伦斯运河开辟于1959年.

sentences.en: The supplier handles transportation procedures. Transportation means: Seaway. Reached port: ordered by the buyer.
sentences.cn: 由供方负责办理运输手续. 运输方式: 海运. 到达港口: 由需方约定.

sentences.en: Where is the St. Lawrence Seaway?
sentences.cn: 圣劳伦斯河的航道位于哪里?

words.tran_cn: [水运]海上航道；船只在海上航行；波涛汹涌的海面

trans.tran_cn: 海上航道，船只在海上航行，波涛汹涌的海面，可航区，航路，海路
trans.tran_en: a waterway giving access to an inland port, navigable by ocean-going ships
